entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado‚ÄéXitlali Baila‚Äé to Awakened 2021This talented beautiful soul will be rocking the stage for our Hip Hop...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado‚ÄéXitlali Baila‚Äé to Awakened 2021

This talented beautiful soul will be rocking the stage for our Hip Hop number this year Hill Desmond Jared üôå

Jared, a native to Colorado, found his love for mo...vement at a young age, being inspired by music and the freedom he felt through dance. He began exploring "Steppn" and other social dances that created a platform to explore the evolving styles of Hip Hop at that time. With a strong Hip Hop influence he found connections in organization that were Hip Hop based, which gave an alternative to the growing youth violence in the early 90s.

Because of his unique skill and ability to captivate an audience, Jared was sought after to be the opening act for groups like Boyz II Men, 112, Case, Dave Hollister, Adina Howard, Naughty by Nature, and numerous other R&B recording artists in the late 1990's. In 2002 Jared placed number One in the nation over 130,000 competitors in the Newport Rhythm and Sound dance competition with his infamous ‚ÄúHat Dance‚Äù. In 2003, Jared was recruited by the Foot Clan to be a featured dancer on the legendary TV show Soul Train. In 2004 he went on to dance with Elements of Motion, a Colorado based Hip Hop dance crew who were the primary entertainment for the Colorado Crush and the Denver Nuggets half time shows at that time. In the Summer of 2007 Jared had the opportunity to train and perform with Gary Kendall and his Monster Shop Bumpn Production, one of the biggest influences of his life in dance.

Jared has also been featured in music videos like "Like a Hobo" by Charlie Winston, ranked #1 in Paris in 2010, "Don't Let Me Fall" and "Strange Clouds" by B.O.B in 2012 and 2013, and B.O.B‚Äôs Air Bender in 2016. Throughout his career he's toured in France, Switzerland, Korea, China, Singapore, and Indonesia.

Now, based on his years of experience, Jared has turned his focus to training and developing the next generation of dancers through his program the Science of Street Dance.

See More

entry.title: Justice
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Justice

McClain died after being injected with a sedative during a police stop in Aurora, Colorado, near Denver.

aljazeera.com

Police, medics charged for 2019 death of Elijah McClain

McClain died after being injected with a sedative during a police stop in Aurora, Colorado, near Denver.McClain died after being injected with a sedative during a police stop in Aurora, Colorado, near Denver.

We‚Äôre moving! ü•≥ We‚Äôre so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we‚Äôre moving up the street to sel...l the same delicious food at @metrocaring. We‚Äôre so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

entry.title: Today we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our...
entry.content: Sanctuary4All ColoradoToday we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our meals. We hope to have the support of each of you as always. each impacted family continues in the fight. see you on Saturday at our inauguration and at our new addressToday we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our meals. We hope to have the support of each of you as always. each impacted family continues in the fight. see you on Saturday at our inauguration and at our new address

Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

entry.title: We‚Äôre moving! ü•≥ We‚Äôre so grateful to have had the space...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is at Metro Caring. ¬∑ Denver

We‚Äôre moving! ü•≥ We‚Äôre so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we‚Äôre moving up the street to sell the same delicious food at @metrocaring. We‚Äôre so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

we are in a new locaci√≥n , we ask you to continue supporting each impacted family, our new locaci√≥n is in metro caring , 1100 e 18 ave denver co 80218, 5 minutes from the church where we were. at the same time from 1 to 3

Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a necessary surgery to treat a hernia. Without insurance, she‚Äôs been ineligible to even schedule the su...rgery until it got worse, and she still has to raise the money to pay for it and take time off work afterward. Buying gorditas, and sharing the sale with family and friends, is one way you can help. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
